sentences.en: Copyright expires 50 years after the death of the author.
sentences.cn: 版权在作者死后50年即行终止.

sentences.en: Copyright was a by - product of the Renaissance.
sentences.cn: 版权是文艺复兴的副产物.

sentences.en: He retained the copyright of his book.
It is illegal to take copies of a copyright work.
sentences.cn: 复制受版权法保护的作品是违法的.

sentences.en: The book is protected by copyright.
The classic remedy for copyright infringement is equitable relief.
sentences.cn: 传统的侵犯版权的救济是衡平法上的救济.

sentences.en: The court granted the plaintiff an injunction restraining the defendant from breaching copyright.
sentences.cn: 法院应原告申请签发禁令,制止被告侵犯版权.

sentences.en: The database will be protected by copyright .
sentences.cn: 这个数据库将受到版权保护。

sentences.en: The film exploited his image and infringed his copyright.
sentences.cn: 这部电影使用了他的形象，侵犯了他的肖像权。

sentences.en: The material can be copied without infringing copyright.
sentences.cn: 这份材料可以复制，不会侵犯版权。

sentences.en: The newspaper put a copyright slug over her story.
sentences.cn: 报纸在她的报道上方标上版权所有的星号.

sentences.en: The publisher sold the copyright on the novel to a movie producer.
sentences.cn: 出版商将这本小说的版权卖给了电影制造商.

sentences.en: The publishing house infringed his copyright.
sentences.cn: 出版社侵犯了他的版权。

sentences.en: The reproduction of copyright material without the permission of the copyright holder is banned by law.
sentences.cn: 未经版权所有人的许可复制受版权法律保护的资料是违法的.

sentences.en: This company has a proprietorship of the copyright.
sentences.cn: 这家公司拥有版权所有权。

sentences.en: To order a book one first had to get permission from the monastery that held the copyright.
sentences.cn: 要想订购书，必须先得到持有该书版权的修道院的许可。

sentences.en: Who owns the copyright of this book?
Who owns the copyright on this song?
sentences.cn: 谁拥有这首歌曲的版权？

words.tran_cn: 有版权的；受版权保护的

trans.tran_en: the legal right to be the only producer or seller of a book, play, film, or record for a specific length of time
